Title: The Benchwarmers
Overview: A trio of guys try and make up for missed opportunities in childhood by forming a three-player baseball team to compete against standard little league squads.
Tagline: Get off the bench and get into the game.
production_companies: Columbia Pictures, Revolution Studios, Happy Madison Productions
Cast: Jon Heder, Rob Schneider, David Spade
clean_text: benchwarmer trio guy try miss opportunity childhood form threeplayer baseball team compete standard little league squad bench game comedy dennis dugan jon heder rob schneider david spade 2006
